responses: The 918 Spyder paired a 4.6-litre V8 with twin electric motors is the fastest porsche, able to give the driver a combined 899PS of power and experience a 0-100km/h time of just 2.6 seconds.
The most expensive Porsche ever sold was a 1970 Porsche 917k which was marketed at $14 million.
The Porsche 935 'Street' slant nose is considered the rarest Porsche to this day, with only one ever being manufactured.
